EntitySubscription.name: EntitySubscription
EntitySubscription.description: Represents a subscription for a user following a record or another user.

NetworkId.description: ID of the Experience Cloud site where the user is following the record or user. This field is available in API version 26.0 and later, if digital experiences is enabled for your org.

ParentId.description: Required. ID of the record or user which the user is following.

SubscriberId.description: Required. ID of the user who is following the record or user.
